reviewText: The Virtual Space Journey DVD is AMAZING! Found the DVD to be visually and musically stimulating. The authors did an excellect job in the creation of this product. It is an outstanding and highly recommended resource for education. My youngest son is revolving his science project around the DVD.

The DVD is very relaxing and has a calming effect for me at the end of those tough workdays when nothing seems to right. I just pop the DVD in the player and my stress seems to dissipate.

Great work on the author's part. Keep up the good work. When will the next journey be available?
